name: Repair Solar Panels
details: Inspect and repair solar panels to ensure optimal energy production.

name: Check Water Supply
details: Conduct regular checks on water storage systems and filter replacements.

name: Conduct Soil Analysis
details: Collect soil samples and analyze for nutrient levels and suitability for cultivation.

name: Mars Rover Maintenance
details: Perform regular maintenance tasks on the Mars rover to ensure its functionality.

name: Monitor Atmospheric Conditions
details: Continuously monitor and record atmospheric conditions using sensors and instruments.

name: Emergency Evacuation Drill
details: Coordinate and conduct an emergency evacuation drill for all personnel on the base.

name: Test Communication Systems
details: Perform tests on communication systems to ensure proper functionality and reliability.

name: Plant Life Support System Maintenance
details: Maintain and repair components of the plant life support system for oxygen production.

name: Conduct Medical Check-ups
details: Perform regular medical check-ups on all crew members to monitor their health.

name: Organize Research Symposium
details: Plan and organize a research symposium to share and discuss scientific findings.
